name: Card O Matic
overview:
With a couple of clicks, Card-O-Matic allows you to send a physical, hand written, greeting card to anyone in the U.S. on the day of your choice from either the web or the Android app.

You can choose a card from one of eight categories, add a personalized, hand written message, select a handwriting style, and add a high resolution 4x6 photo from your camera, library, Facebook, or Instagram. To guarantee your card has been shipped, you will be notified via email the moment your card is placed in the mail. If your card is somehow lost in transit, Card-O-Matic is willing to resend the card, or refund your purchase. This app/website is perfect for the last minute card purchaser, forgetful grandson, and/or the well-organized mom. Remove the burden of buying, writing, stamping, and sending with Card-O-Matic today.
